education.degree: B.S. in Software Engineering and Computer Science
education.institution: Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology, Terre Haute, IN
honors: Dean’s List (Fall 2022, Winter 2022, Spring 2023, Fall 2023, Winter 2023, Spring 2024)

experience.title: Robotics Engineering Intern
responsibilities: Developed an OTA operating system update solution for autonomous mowers, ensuring continued support.
Modified the on-machine NTRIP Client to follow the RTCM standard, resolving a 10% reconnection issue.
Detected and removed memory leaks totaling 40 KB/s, improving machine runtime.

experience.title: Part-Time Software Engineering Intern
responsibilities: Developing image recognition software for an upcoming autonomy project.

experience.title: Sophomore Resident Tutor
experience.company: Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology, Terre Haute, IN
responsibilities: Writing and conducting exam review sessions for sophomore-level software engineering courses.
Holding 8 tutor hours weekly to support student learning.
Fostering a community as a live-in peer tutor, balancing academic success with fun.

experience.title: CSSE Department Teaching Assistant
experience.company: Rose-Hulman Institute of Technology, Terre Haute, IN
responsibilities: Tutored students on database concepts through assignments and labs.
Graded assignments and provided feedback to promote learning.

projects.title: Dominion – Software Quality
description: Collaborated with a team to develop a video game version of the classic card game Dominion.
Utilized test-driven development methods to ensure minimal code rework.
Programmed in C# using the .NET framework, achieving 100% branch and mutation coverage.

projects.title: Micro Processor Design
description: Designed and implemented a 16-bit microprocessor using Verilog with a team.
Created an assembly language and an assembler for the microprocessor.

projects.title: Database Creation
description: Built a SQL database and frontend to allow users to sort and search computer parts and create compatible builds.

projects.title: TypeSmart
description: Developed a typing app to improve and track typing speed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implemented a Firebase NoSQL database backend to store user information.

projects.title: Threads Project
description: Designed and implemented threads in the xv6 educational operating system.

achievements.title: Boy Scouts of America (Eagle Scout)
description: Eagle Project: Installed 21 wayfinding and natural feature signs at Allemansratt Park, Lindstrom, MN.
